title: Stock Master
description: Full Stack application using Spring Boot Framework that generates cutomized stock portfolio based on user's preference of market cap, sector exposure, and dividend yield.

title: Game Hub
description: Video game navigation platform that uses React for its front end interface and TypeScript to make API calls to the RAWG API, fetching game information.

title: Python AlgoTrader
description: Python script that analyzes historical data and uses the intersection of moving averages to determines the optimal entry and exit of a position

title: Personal Website
description: Personal website created using React showcasing my blogs, experience, and projects.
